lines.text: The swastika is on my passport Miss... not on me.

Damn you all! You vile, rotten people! You think you own the world and everyone in it - you don't own the world! You'll never own it! And every day you're losing more and more of what you did own of it and thank God for that! Our day will come, and when it does, we'll make you pay... for everything! For everything you've done!
As for your Fuhrer's "principles", I think they may best be judged by the suffering they've caused for so many thousands of innocent people!
The best news is what Miep has told us, and much closer to home now, that the roundups have stopped.
Oh, it's been weeks and weeks since the last one.
Maybe they're only making room in the death camps for more.
